com.paypal.selion.platform.mobile.android

Interface SeLionAndroidBridgeDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeLionAppiumAndroidDriver, SeLionSelendroidDriver

    public interface SeLionAndroidBridgeDriver
    SeLionAndroidBridgeDriver acts as a single level of abstraction for the page object model implementation for android mobile drivers. UserinterfaceObject class depends on this abstraction to delegate calls to the respective driver implementations.

      • swipeLeft

        void swipeLeft(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement webElement)
        Performs the swipe left action on the WebElement. The swipe gesture can be performed over any surface. The targeted UI element does not need to be scrollable.
        Parameters:
        webElement - Instance of WebElement.
